apps.name: cassandra
apps.description: Open-source NoSQL distributed database for scalable, high-availability data.

parameters.name: CASSANDRA_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Cassandra superuser password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: CASSANDRA_CLUSTER_NAME
parameters.description: Name of the Cassandra cluster

parameters.name: CASSANDRA_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for Cassandra data

parameters.name: CASSANDRA_MAX_HEAP_SIZE
parameters.description: Maximum JVM heap size (recommend ~25% of VM RAM)

parameters.name: CASSANDRA_HEAP_NEWSIZE
parameters.description: JVM young generation heap size

parameters.name: CASSANDRA_NUM_TOKENS
parameters.description: Number of virtual node tokens

apps.name: coolify
apps.description: Open-source self-hosted PaaS alternative to Heroku, Netlify, and Vercel.

parameters.name: COOLIFY_DB_PASSWORD
parameters.description: PostgreSQL password for Coolify database (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: COOLIFY_REDIS_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Redis password for session and cache store (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: COOLIFY_APP_KEY
parameters.description: Laravel APP_KEY for encryption (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: COOLIFY_PUSHER_APP_ID
parameters.description: Soketi WebSocket app ID

parameters.name: COOLIFY_PUSHER_APP_KEY
parameters.description: Soketi WebSocket app key (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: COOLIFY_PUSHER_APP_SECRET
parameters.description: Soketi WebSocket app secret (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: COOLIFY_DB_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for PostgreSQL data

parameters.name: COOLIFY_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for Coolify application data

apps.name: couchdb
apps.description: Open-source NoSQL document database with HTTP API and multi-version concurrency control.

parameters.name: COUCHDB_PASSWORD
parameters.description: CouchDB admin password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: COUCHDB_USER
parameters.description: CouchDB admin username

parameters.name: COUCHDB_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for CouchDB data

apps.name: gitea
apps.description: Lightweight, self-hosted Git service with web UI, issue tracking, and CI/CD.

parameters.name: GITEA_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for Gitea data (repos, SQLite DB, config)

apps.name: jenkins
apps.description: Open-source CI/CD automation server for building, testing, and deploying software.

parameters.name: JENKINS_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for Jenkins home directory

parameters.name: JENKINS_JAVA_OPTS
parameters.description: JVM heap settings for Jenkins

apps.name: kafka
apps.description: Open-source distributed streaming platform for real-time data pipelines and event-driven architectures.

parameters.name: KAFKA_CLUSTER_ID
parameters.description: KRaft cluster ID (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: KAFKA_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for Kafka data

parameters.name: KAFKA_HEAP_OPTS
parameters.description: JVM heap settings (recommend paired Xms/Xmx, ~25% of VM RAM)

apps.name: keycloak
apps.description: Open-source identity and access management with SSO, social login, and user federation.

parameters.name: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Keycloak admin password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_USER
parameters.description: Keycloak admin username

parameters.name: KEYCLOAK_DB_PASSWORD
parameters.description: PostgreSQL password for Keycloak database (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: KEYCLOAK_DB_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for PostgreSQL data

parameters.name: KEYCLOAK_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for Keycloak data

apps.name: mariadb
apps.description: MySQL-compatible relational database with enhanced performance and open-source commitment.

parameters.name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
parameters.description: MariaDB root password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: MARIADB_USER
parameters.description: Name of the default non-root user

parameters.name: MARIADB_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Password for the default non-root user (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: MARIADB_DATABASE
parameters.description: Name of the default database created on first start

parameters.name: MARIADB_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for MariaDB data

apps.name: mongodb
apps.description: Document-oriented NoSQL database for modern applications with flexible schemas.

parameters.name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
parameters.description: MongoDB admin username

parameters.name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
parameters.description: MongoDB admin password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: MONGODB_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for MongoDB data

apps.name: mysql
apps.description: World's most popular open-source relational database for web and enterprise applications.

parameters.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
parameters.description: MySQL root password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: MYSQL_USER
parameters.description: Name of the default non-root user

parameters.name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Password for the default non-root user (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: MYSQL_DATABASE
parameters.description: Name of the default database created on first start

parameters.name: MYSQL_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for MySQL data

apps.name: opensearch
apps.description: Open-source search and analytics engine, Apache 2.0 fork of Elasticsearch.

parameters.name: OPENSEARCH_PASSWORD
parameters.description: OpenSearch admin password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: OPENSEARCH_CLUSTER_NAME
parameters.description: Name of the OpenSearch cluster

parameters.name: OPENSEARCH_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for OpenSearch data

parameters.name: OPENSEARCH_JAVA_OPTS
parameters.description: JVM heap settings (recommend paired Xms/Xmx, ~25% of VM RAM)

apps.name: percona-mysql
apps.description: Enhanced, drop-in replacement for MySQL with improved performance and additional features.

parameters.name: PERCONA_ROOT_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Percona MySQL root password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: PERCONA_USER
parameters.description: Name of the default non-root user

parameters.name: PERCONA_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Password for the default non-root user (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: PERCONA_DATABASE
parameters.description: Name of the default database created on first start

parameters.name: PERCONA_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for Percona MySQL data

apps.name: postgresql
apps.description: Open-source relational database known for reliability, extensibility, and SQL compliance.

parameters.name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
parameters.description: PostgreSQL superuser password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: POSTGRES_USER
parameters.description: PostgreSQL superuser username

parameters.name: POSTGRES_DB
parameters.description: Name of the default database created on first start

parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for PostgreSQL data

parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_MAX_CONNECTIONS
parameters.description: Maximum number of concurrent client connections

parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_SHARED_BUFFERS
parameters.description: Amount of memory for shared buffer cache

parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_WORK_MEM
parameters.description: Memory per query operation (sorts, hashes)

apps.name: seaweedfs
apps.description: S3-compatible distributed object storage with built-in filer and high throughput.

parameters.name: SEAWEEDFS_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for SeaweedFS data

parameters.name: SEAWEEDFS_VOLUME_SIZE_LIMIT
parameters.description: Maximum size of each volume file in megabytes

apps.name: valkey
apps.description: High-performance in-memory data store for caching, messaging, and real-time applications.

parameters.name: VALKEY_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Valkey authentication password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: VALKEY_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for Valkey data

parameters.name: VALKEY_MAXMEMORY
parameters.description: Maximum memory Valkey will use for data storage

parameters.name: VALKEY_MAXMEMORY_POLICY
parameters.description: Policy for evicting keys when maxmemory is reached

apps.name: wordpress
apps.description: Open-source content management system for building websites, blogs, and applications.

parameters.name: WORDPRESS_ADMIN_USER
parameters.description: WordPress administrator username

parameters.name: WORDPRESS_ADMIN_PASSWORD
parameters.description: WordPress administrator password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: WORDPRESS_ADMIN_EMAIL
parameters.description: WordPress administrator email address

parameters.name: WORDPRESS_SITE_TITLE
parameters.description: WordPress site title

parameters.name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
parameters.description: MariaDB root password (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: MARIADB_PASSWORD
parameters.description: MariaDB user password for WordPress (auto-generated if not set)

parameters.name: WORDPRESS_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for WordPress files

parameters.name: MARIADB_DATA_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of persistent volume for MariaDB data
